hizbs.text: waqala ir'kabu fiha bis'mi l-lahi majraha wamur'saha inna rabbi laghafurun rahimun
wahiya tajri bihim fi mawjin kal-jibali wanada nuhun ib'nahu wakana fi maʿzilin yabunayya ir'kab maʿana wala takun maʿa l-kafirina
qala saawi ila jabalin yaʿsimuni mina l-mai qala la ʿasima l-yawma min amri l-lahi illa man rahima wahala baynahuma l-mawju fakana mina l-mugh'raqina
waqila yaardu ib'laʿi maaki wayasamau aqliʿi waghida l-mau waqudiya l-amru wa-is'tawat ʿala l-judiyi waqila buʿ'dan lil'qawmi l-zalimina
wanada nuhun rabbahu faqala rabbi inna ib'ni min ahli wa-inna waʿdaka l-haqu wa-anta ahkamu l-hakimina
qala yanuhu innahu laysa min ahlika innahu ʿamalun ghayru salihin fala tasalni ma laysa laka bihi ʿil'mun inni aʿizuka an takuna mina l-jahilina
qala rabbi inni aʿudhu bika an asalaka ma laysa li bihi ʿil'mun wa-illa taghfir li watarhamni akun mina l-khasirina
qila yanuhu ih'bit bisalamin minna wabarakatin ʿalayka waʿala umamin mimman maʿaka wa-umamun sanumattiʿuhum thumma yamassuhum minna ʿadhabun alimun
til'ka min anbai l-ghaybi nuhiha ilayka ma kunta taʿlamuha anta wala qawmuka min qabli hadha fa-is'bir inna l-ʿaqibata lil'muttaqina
wa-ila ʿadin akhahum hudan qala yaqawmi uʿ'budu l-laha ma lakum min ilahin ghayruhu in antum illa muf'taruna
yaqawmi la asalukum ʿalayhi ajran in ajriya illa ʿala alladhi fatarani afala taʿqiluna
wayaqawmi is'taghfiru rabbakum thumma tubu ilayhi yur'sili l-samaa ʿalaykum mid'raran wayazid'kum quwwatan ila quwwatikum wala tatawallaw muj'rimina
qalu yahudu ma ji'tana bibayyinatin wama nahnu bitariki alihatina ʿan qawlika wama nahnu laka bimu'minina
in naqulu illa iʿ'taraka baʿdu alihatina bisuin qala inni ush'hidu l-laha wa-ish'hadu anni barion mimma tush'rikuna
min dunihi fakiduni jamiʿan thumma la tunziruni
inni tawakkaltu ʿala l-lahi rabbi warabbikum ma min dabbatin illa huwa akhidhun binasiyatiha inna rabbi ʿala siratin mus'taqimin
fa-in tawallaw faqad ablaghtukum ma ur'sil'tu bihi ilaykum wayastakhlifu rabbi qawman ghayrakum wala tadurrunahu shayan inna rabbi ʿala kulli shayin hafizun
walamma jaa amruna najjayna hudan wa-alladhina amanu maʿahu birahmatin minna wanajjaynahum min ʿadhabin ghalizin
watil'ka ʿadun jahadu biayati rabbihim waʿasaw rusulahu wa-ittabaʿu amra kulli jabbarin ʿanidin
wa-ut'biʿu fi hadhihi l-dun'ya laʿnatan wayawma l-qiyamati ala inna ʿadan kafaru rabbahum ala buʿ'dan liʿadin qawmi hudin
